title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
plot: Many years after the reign of Caesar, a young ape goes on a journey that will lead him to question everything he's been taught about the past and make choices that will define a future for apes and humans alike.

subtitles.author: ALL SUB
lines:
282900 286570 Elder Luna says
make your heart still.
286706 288738 The right egg will sing to you.

339087 342055 - By length of a sunset.
- Is older.

518875 520853 [Anaya] Do you wonder
what your bird will look like?

520877 523335 [Soona] Long as it does not
look like you, Anaya.
629147 634116 Echo do not come in from Valley.

689340 691805 - How far did you climb?
- Was it dangerous?

705794 707590 [child 1] How many eggs
did you honor?

707725 709174 - [child 2] Show us the egg.
- [child 3] Did you climb well?

709198 711002 - [child 4] Show us the egg.
- [child 5] Show us your egg.

743230 746734 [child 2] Come on.
Come on. Give, give! Hey!
774157 776995 I knew you would climb well.
799414 802218 Your father will want to see.

830086 832979 [male chimp 2] Noa, didn't
think you'd make it back.

908197 914033 Sun Eagle does not like work
for tomorrow's ceremony.

944000 947399 You did not go
to the Valley Beyond?

952272 956107 Yet blood of Echo
on your blanket.
956243 959441 We did not go to Valley Beyond.
990308 993343 Oda will chase the pests away.

1006163 1011289 This blanket had the blood
of an Echo on it.

1014169 1017330 This is a bad sign
for all of us.
1065284 1068853 I do not understand Eagle Sun.

1084140 1087074 They send Oda
to scare Echo away.
1098713 1101881 She saw a small and a big.

1280270 1283030 Master of Birds
will make exception.

1283166 1286168 They will not make him wait
for next season.
1296878 1299253 Then I will wait with you.

1526142 1528975 Follow the horse!
Find his clan!

2494584 2499453 [Raka] Apes falling
from the sky. Hmm.

2502823 2507588 He was outside
when they arrived.

2530652 2536282 They are an ancient way
to store ideas.

2585204 2590335 Your clan does not know
the true Caesar. [grunts]

2590471 2593679 Too many have forgotten
who he was.
2595814 2598613 I know Elders of my village.

2609725 2614029 it was Caesar who taught us
what it means to be ape.
2614165 2618634 He was our leader, our lawgiver.
2656436 2658341 Now it is rare to see even one.

2658476 2663783 But in Caesar's time,
there were vast herds of them.

2667616 2672217 Perhaps here,
humans were cared for, fed...

2713837 2717738 when humans and apes
lived side by side.

2721668 2726912 Yes, it is a puzzle.
I know. But...

2728279 2731045 they were important
to Caesar. Hmm.
2731180 2735349 So they are important to me.
2739859 2741960 I have to get to my horse.
2762544 2764977 There is much I could teach you.

2789636 2793044 She follows you
from your village?

2809759 2812893 I will not slow you down.
I, too, keep a horse.
2875523 2877529 My father was Master of Birds.
2887742 2890707 I would have enjoyed a song.

2962216 2965216 She follows
because she is hungry.

3030418 3034220 I do not know why.
It is from Caesar's time.

3034355 3039619 Why did Caesar care so much
for Echoes?

3039755 3044427 Legend says
he was reared by them...

3076196 3079363 Caesar never had
to share camp...

3300686 3303121 - If Echo comes, she must ride.
- Hmm.

3303256 3307294 Is my young companion showing compassion
for our fellow traveler?

3338219 3341592 Then, of course,
there is the gibbon.

3344497 3351504 Is most unfortunate that the human can
only use its feet for walking.

3351639 3354135 Imagine if you were falling
from a tree.

3354270 3356841 You only have two appendages
to save your life.

3356977 3360309 But if you were able to use
both of your hands...

3365084 3369951 And I imagine that,
if I came across a special...

3455974 3460206 We feared the herds
ceased to exist.
3493382 3496077 The Nova stays with her kind.
3558007 3559976 Would you like to join them?

3942957 3947666 You said this Nova
was smarter than most.

3950402 3952702 Some intelligence,
to be sure, but...

3961711 3963984 I know where
they're taking your clan.
4652936 4655235 Not a lot of fiction there.

4682563 4686335 Well, doesn't really matter,
does it?
4690941 4693547 Made it almost to the coast

4693683 4696814 and then I fell
and shattered my ankles.

4700647 4704982 And now you read him
Roman history.

4711460 4714592 I'm the human
not helping the apes.

4864481 4868355 Are we thankful
for the words of Caesar?
4898018 4900947 When I think on those words...

4927210 4933011 Now, when I think of all the treasures
left inside for us...
4940488 4942896 It may be difficult to open.

5060876 5063215 Whoever's in there
is either dead or gone.

5064880 5067813 We've been bangin'
on that door for months.

5070885 5073187 [Mae] Do you not know
where we are?

5073322 5076654 When things got bad
and the government went underground,
5076790 5078694 this is where half of it went.

5078829 5081992 With all their technology,
and all their weapons...

5086671 5088968 That ape cannot have
what is inside the...

5089104 5092244 You gotta stop thinking
about the way things were

5092380 5094642 and start thinking
about the way they are.

5096945 5099745 and you have a chance
to be a part of it.

5099881 5102316 What, and build a world
for the apes?

5113362 5116301 There's hot water and fresh clothes
in that room back there.

5117904 5120635 You'll feel better
when you get yourself cleaned up.

5122237 5124705 You better figure out
how to be useful around here.

5149337 5154367 The Elders
did not tell us everything

5157446 5161115 They did not tell us
because they did not know.
5162413 5165548 They did not want to know.

5193813 5196145 [Trevathan] And that's why
they call it a toga party.

5199488 5203449 [Proximus] You are a funny
little human, Trevathan.
5236554 5239490 You two have come a long way.

5280864 5284502 you are familiar
with the concept of...
5287077 5289673 That is the human label, yeah?

5289808 5294282 The advancement
that I crave requires time.

5294417 5298285 Vast amounts of time
that I do not have.

5299620 5302783 Unfortunately, I am
but a mortal ape.

5305093 5310128 So this is why I need
to get the knowledge inside that vault.

5323546 5329181 humans were capable
of many great things, yes?

5344367 5347894 Apes will learn.
I will learn, yeah,
5348030 5351237 from what is inside that vault.

5373121 5376495 I believe this map
belonged to you.

5379159 5381627 before she was traveling
with you

5395418 5398943 my apes did not realize
their value,
5399079 5403448 so I was brought only bodies.

5403584 5407988 I could not speak to them
like I can speak to you.

5412029 5415462 you are coming here
to get inside my vault.

5425679 5429944 No matter how many apes
it costs me.

5434087 5439085 I have heard that you are
a very clever ape, yeah?

5441390 5445257 He repaired one of your
broken staffs, Trevathan.
5448196 5451971 I have much use for clever apes.

5456504 5460546 did Mae tell you
how to get inside my vault?
5487871 5489443 I have something to show you.
5497077 5499146 Tell me, what do you see?

5531917 5534978 Where there are two
that can speak,

5538752 5544495 Mae has come here to claim
the tools inside my vault.

5552608 5554808 That is why
I must have them first.

5556307 5561741 They do not understand
that this is our time.

5571518 5574990 Unless we want to live
in cages again.

5648869 5653805 And Proximus has no need
for eagles.

5798416 5801316 It would be very good for you
to be there.

5840391 5843060 [Noa] You did not come
for Echoes.

5866087 5868949 - And I was afraid.
- The more you speak,
5871255 5873185 I was wrong not to trust you.

5874491 5877623 I trust you
only to help yourself.
5879998 5882463 But that could help me now.
5896511 5898951 What do you need inside vault?

5910933 5913691 Humans lost their ability
to speak.

5913827 5915562 And this book
might bring it back.
5960213 5962213 And it almost killed all of us.
5969087 5971783 You know a way inside, yes?

5981035 5985269 Will water destroy
what is inside?
6104785 6106258 We're gonna need all of this.
6236058 6237983 We were born within a sunset.

6243025 6244730 [Trevathan] He's just
going to rebuild it.

6265217 6269850 But you're fantasizing about a past
that can never come back.

6290172 6294171 Nobody is going to blame you
for what happened here.

6310464 6312893 He's gonna skin
your monkey alive.

6418970 6421441 [Anaya] You said
there would be climb!
6451767 6453605 We need to go up there.
7025211 7030314 Noa, you are a very useful ape.
7035791 7038417 And yet, you fail to observe

7048037 7051731 Here comes your clan
to bear witness.

7057479 7061675 to put your faith
in such a duplicitous creature.

7079294 7083895 what did Mae have planned
for me inside my own vault?

7158080 7162776 are there more of those
in there?

7542225 7545226 You think you can
destroy my kingdom?

7555270 7558842 You think you can
destroy what I am?

7591439 7594680 so that you can bend
for your king...
7601853 7605891 And you will all bear witness

7606026 7611890 - as Noa bends before his king.
- [all whimpering]
7857505 7861479 Not until you claim all things
7866480 7868953 That silo was a human place

7869089 7870886 with human things
and human ideas.
7871022 7872557 It was not meant for apes.
7877426 7879526 Should we go back to silence?
7905958 7908389 he would tell us his Caesar
7909323 7911798 had much to say on this.
7924913 7930676 Can ape and human live together?

8100084 8100921 [woman] Let me know
what that distribution looks like.

8103458 8105134 - [man 2] Link is ready!
- [woman 1] Pulling up now.
8161175 8163308 This is Fort Wayne, Indiana. We read you!
8164817 8166815 It's good to hear another voice out there.
8166950 8168815 Tell me where you are. What's your location?

5064880 5067813 We've been bangin'
on that door for months.

5070885 5073187 [Mae] Do you not know
where we are?

5073322 5076654 When things got bad
and the government went underground,
5076790 5078694 this is where half of it went.

5078829 5081992 With all their technology,
and all their weapons...

5086671 5088968 That ape cannot have
what is inside the...

5089104 5092244 You gotta stop thinking
about the way things were

5092380 5094642 and start thinking
about the way they are.

5096945 5099745 and you have a chance
to be a part of it.

5099881 5102316 What, and build a world
for the apes?

5113362 5116301 There's hot water and fresh clothes
in that room back there.

5117904 5120635 You'll feel better
when you get yourself cleaned up.

5122237 5124705 You better figure out
how to be useful around here.

5149337 5154367 The Elders
did not tell us everything

5157446 5161115 They did not tell us
because they did not know.
5162413 5165548 They did not want to know.

5193813 5196145 [Trevathan] And that's why
they call it a toga party.

5199488 5203449 [Proximus] You are a funny
little human, Trevathan.
5236554 5239490 You two have come a long way.

5280864 5284502 you are familiar
with the concept of...
5287077 5289673 That is the human label, yeah?

5289808 5294282 The advancement
that I crave requires time.

5294417 5298285 Vast amounts of time
that I do not have.

5299620 5302783 Unfortunately, I am
but a mortal ape.

5305093 5310128 So this is why I need
to get the knowledge inside that vault.

5323546 5329181 humans were capable
of many great things, yes?

5344367 5347894 Apes will learn.
I will learn, yeah,
5348030 5351237 from what is inside that vault.

5373121 5376495 I believe this map
belonged to you.

5379159 5381627 before she was traveling
with you

5395418 5398943 my apes did not realize
their value,
5399079 5403448 so I was brought only bodies.

5403584 5407988 I could not speak to them
like I can speak to you.

5412029 5415462 you are coming here
to get inside my vault.

5425679 5429944 No matter how many apes
it costs me.

5434087 5439085 I have heard that you are
a very clever ape, yeah?

5441390 5445257 He repaired one of your
broken staffs, Trevathan.
5448196 5451971 I have much use for clever apes.

5456504 5460546 did Mae tell you
how to get inside my vault?
5487871 5489443 I have something to show you.
5497077 5499146 Tell me, what do you see?

5531917 5534978 Where there are two
that can speak,

5538752 5544495 Mae has come here to claim
the tools inside my vault.

5552608 5554808 That is why
I must have them first.

5556307 5561741 They do not understand
that this is our time.

5571518 5574990 Unless we want to live
in cages again.

5648869 5653805 And Proximus has no need
for eagles.

5798416 5801316 It would be very good for you
to be there.

5840391 5843060 [Noa] You did not come
for Echoes.

5866087 5868949 - And I was afraid.
- The more you speak,
5871255 5873185 I was wrong not to trust you.

5874491 5877623 I trust you
only to help yourself.
5879998 5882463 But that could help me now.
5896511 5898951 What do you need inside vault?

5910933 5913691 Humans lost their ability
to speak.

5913827 5915562 And this book
might bring it back.
5960213 5962213 And it almost killed all of us.
5969087 5971783 You know a way inside, yes?

5981035 5985269 Will water destroy
what is inside?
6104785 6106258 We're gonna need all of this.
6236058 6237983 We were born within a sunset.

6243025 6244730 [Trevathan] He's just
going to rebuild it.

6265217 6269850 But you're fantasizing about a past
that can never come back.

6290172 6294171 Nobody is going to blame you
for what happened here.

6310464 6312893 He's gonna skin
your monkey alive.

6418970 6421441 [Anaya] You said
there would be climb!
6451767 6453605 We need to go up there.
7025211 7030314 Noa, you are a very useful ape.
7035791 7038417 And yet, you fail to observe

7048037 7051731 Here comes your clan
to bear witness.

7057479 7061675 to put your faith
in such a duplicitous creature.

7079294 7083895 what did Mae have planned
for me inside my own vault?

7158080 7162776 are there more of those
in there?

7542225 7545226 You think you can
destroy my kingdom?

7555270 7558842 You think you can
destroy what I am?

7591439 7594680 so that you can bend
for your king...
7601853 7605891 And you will all bear witness

7606026 7611890 - as Noa bends before his king.
- [all whimpering]
7857505 7861479 Not until you claim all things
7866480 7868953 That silo was a human place

7869089 7870886 with human things
and human ideas.
7871022 7872557 It was not meant for apes.
7877426 7879526 Should we go back to silence?
7905958 7908389 he would tell us his Caesar
7909323 7911798 had much to say on this.
7924913 7930676 Can ape and human live together?

8100084 8100921 [woman] Let me know
what that distribution looks like.

8103458 8105134 - [man 2] Link is ready!
- [woman 1] Pulling up now.
8161175 8163308 This is Fort Wayne, Indiana. We read you!
8164817 8166815 It's good to hear another voice out there.
8166950 8168815 Tell me where you are. What's your location?

282900 286570 Elder Luna says
make your heart still.
286706 288738 The right egg will sing to you.

339087 342055 - By length of a sunset.
- Is older.

518875 520853 [Anaya] Do you wonder
what your bird will look like?

520877 523335 [Soona] Long as it does not
look like you, Anaya.
629147 634116 Echo do not come in from Valley.

689340 691805 - How far did you climb?
- Was it dangerous?

705794 707590 [child 1] How many eggs
did you honor?

- [child 5] Show us your egg.

Come on. Give, give! Hey!
774157 776995 I knew you would climb well.
799414 802218 Your father will want to see.

think you'd make it back.

for tomorrow's ceremony.

to the Valley Beyond?

952272 956107 Yet blood of Echo
on your blanket.
956243 959441 We did not go to Valley Beyond.
990308 993343 Oda will chase the pests away.

1014169 1017330 This is a bad sign
for all of us.
1065284 1068853 I do not understand Eagle Sun.

to scare Echo away.
1098713 1101881 She saw a small and a big.

1280270 1283030 Master of Birds
will make exception.

1283166 1286168 They will not make him wait
for next season.
1296878 1299253 Then I will wait with you.

1526142 1528975 Follow the horse!
Find his clan!

2494584 2499453 [Raka] Apes falling
from the sky. Hmm.

2502823 2507588 He was outside
when they arrived.

2530652 2536282 They are an ancient way
to store ideas.

2585204 2590335 Your clan does not know
the true Caesar. [grunts]

2590471 2593679 Too many have forgotten
who he was.
2595814 2598613 I know Elders of my village.

2609725 2614029 it was Caesar who taught us
what it means to be ape.
2614165 2618634 He was our leader, our lawgiver.
2656436 2658341 Now it is rare to see even one.

2658476 2663783 But in Caesar's time,
there were vast herds of them.

2667616 2672217 Perhaps here,
humans were cared for, fed...

2713837 2717738 when humans and apes
lived side by side.

2721668 2726912 Yes, it is a puzzle.
I know. But...

2728279 2731045 they were important
to Caesar. Hmm.
2731180 2735349 So they are important to me.
2739859 2741960 I have to get to my horse.
2762544 2764977 There is much I could teach you.

2789636 2793044 She follows you
from your village?

2809759 2812893 I will not slow you down.
I, too, keep a horse.
2875523 2877529 My father was Master of Birds.
2887742 2890707 I would have enjoyed a song.

2962216 2965216 She follows
because she is hungry.

3030418 3034220 I do not know why.
It is from Caesar's time.

3034355 3039619 Why did Caesar care so much
for Echoes?

3039755 3044427 Legend says
he was reared by them...

3076196 3079363 Caesar never had
to share camp...

3300686 3303121 - If Echo comes, she must ride.
- Hmm.

3303256 3307294 Is my young companion showing compassion
for our fellow traveler?

3338219 3341592 Then, of course,
there is the gibbon.

3344497 3351504 Is most unfortunate that the human can
only use its feet for walking.

3351639 3354135 Imagine if you were falling
from a tree.

3354270 3356841 You only have two appendages
to save your life.

3356977 3360309 But if you were able to use
both of your hands...

3365084 3369951 And I imagine that,
if I came across a special...

3455974 3460206 We feared the herds
ceased to exist.
3493382 3496077 The Nova stays with her kind.
3558007 3559976 Would you like to join them?

3942957 3947666 You said this Nova
was smarter than most.

3950402 3952702 Some intelligence,
to be sure, but...

3961711 3963984 I know where
they're taking your clan.
4652936 4655235 Not a lot of fiction there.

4682563 4686335 Well, doesn't really matter,
does it?
4690941 4693547 Made it almost to the coast

4693683 4696814 and then I fell
and shattered my ankles.

4700647 4704982 And now you read him
Roman history.

4711460 4714592 I'm the human
not helping the apes.

4864481 4868355 Are we thankful
for the words of Caesar?
4898018 4900947 When I think on those words...

8164530 8165990 It's good to hear another voice out there.
8166950 8168820 Tell me where you are. What's your location?

subtitles.author: tedi
lines:
282900 286570 Elder Luna says
make your heart still.
286706 288738 The right egg will sing to you.

339087 342055 - By length of a sunset.
- Is older.

518875 520853 [Anaya] Do you wonder
what your bird will look like?

520877 523335 [Soona] Long as it does not
look like you, Anaya.
629147 634116 Echo do not come in from Valley.

689340 691805 - How far did you climb?
- Was it dangerous?

705794 707590 [child 1] How many eggs
did you honor?

707725 709174 - [child 2] Show us the egg.
- [child 3] Did you climb well?

709198 711002 - [child 4] Show us the egg.
- [child 5] Show us your egg.

743230 746734 [child 2] Come on.
Come on. Give, give! Hey!
774157 776995 I knew you would climb well.
799414 802218 Your father will want to see.

830086 832979 [male chimp 2] Noa, didn't
think you'd make it back.

908197 914033 Sun Eagle does not like work
for tomorrow's ceremony.

944000 947399 You did not go
to the Valley Beyond?

952272 956107 Yet blood of Echo
on your blanket.
956243 959441 We did not go to Valley Beyond.
990308 993343 Oda will chase the pests away.

1006163 1011289 This blanket had the blood
of an Echo on it.

1014169 1017330 This is a bad sign
for all of us.
1065284 1068853 I do not understand Eagle Sun.

1084140 1087074 They send Oda
to scare Echo away.
1098713 1101881 She saw a small and a big.

1280270 1283030 Master of Birds
will make exception.

1283166 1286168 They will not make him wait
for next season.
1296878 1299253 Then I will wait with you.

1526142 1528975 Follow the horse!
Find his clan!

2494584 2499453 [Raka] Apes falling
from the sky. Hmm.

2502823 2507588 He was outside
when they arrived.

2530652 2536282 They are an ancient way
to store ideas.

2585204 2590335 Your clan does not know
the true Caesar. [grunts]

2590471 2593679 Too many have forgotten
who he was.
2595814 2598613 I know Elders of my village.

2609725 2614029 it was Caesar who taught us
what it means to be ape.
2614165 2618634 He was our leader, our lawgiver.
2656436 2658341 Now it is rare to see even one.

2658476 2663783 But in Caesar's time,
there were vast herds of them.

2667616 2672217 Perhaps here,
humans were cared for, fed...

2713837 2717738 when humans and apes
lived side by side.

2721668 2726912 Yes, it is a puzzle.
I know. But...

2728279 2731045 they were important
to Caesar. Hmm.
2731180 2735349 So they are important to me.
2739859 2741960 I have to get to my horse.
2762544 2764977 There is much I could teach you.

2789636 2793044 She follows you
from your village?

2809759 2812893 I will not slow you down.
I, too, keep a horse.
2875523 2877529 My father was Master of Birds.
2887742 2890707 I would have enjoyed a song.

2962216 2965216 She follows
because she is hungry.

3030418 3034220 I do not know why.
It is from Caesar's time.

3034355 3039619 Why did Caesar care so much
for Echoes?

3039755 3044427 Legend says
he was reared by them...

3076196 3079363 Caesar never had
to share camp...

3300686 3303121 - If Echo comes, she must ride.
- Hmm.

3303256 3307294 Is my young companion showing compassion
for our fellow traveler?

3338219 3341592 Then, of course,
there is the gibbon.

3344497 3351504 Is most unfortunate that the human can
only use its feet for walking.

3351639 3354135 Imagine if you were falling
from a tree.

3354270 3356841 You only have two appendages
to save your life.

3356977 3360309 But if you were able to use
both of your hands...

3365084 3369951 And I imagine that,
if I came across a special...

3455974 3460206 We feared the herds
ceased to exist.
3493382 3496077 The Nova stays with her kind.
3558007 3559976 Would you like to join them?

3942957 3947666 You said this Nova
was smarter than most.

3950402 3952702 Some intelligence,
to be sure, but...

3961711 3963984 I know where
they're taking your clan.
4652936 4655235 Not a lot of fiction there.

4682563 4686335 Well, doesn't really matter,
does it?
4690941 4693547 Made it almost to the coast

4693683 4696814 and then I fell
and shattered my ankles.

4700647 4704982 And now you read him
Roman history.

4711460 4714592 I'm the human
not helping the apes.

4864481 4868355 Are we thankful
for the words of Caesar?
4898018 4900947 When I think on those words...

4927210 4933011 Now, when I think of all the treasures
left inside for us...
4940488 4942896 It may be difficult to open.

5060876 5063215 Whoever's in there
is either dead or gone.

5064880 5067813 We've been bangin'
on that door for months.

5070885 5073187 [Mae] Do you not know
where we are?

5073322 5076654 When things got bad
and the government went underground,
5076790 5078694 this is where half of it went.

5078829 5081992 With all their technology,
and all their weapons...

5086671 5088968 That ape cannot have
what is inside the...

5089104 5092244 You gotta stop thinking
about the way things were

5092380 5094642 and start thinking
about the way they are.

5096945 5099745 and you have a chance
to be a part of it.

5099881 5102316 What, and build a world
for the apes?

5113362 5116301 There's hot water and fresh clothes
in that room back there.

5117904 5120635 You'll feel better
when you get yourself cleaned up.

5122237 5124705 You better figure out
how to be useful around here.

5149337 5154367 The Elders
did not tell us everything

5157446 5161115 They did not tell us
because they did not know.
5162413 5165548 They did not want to know.

5193813 5196145 [Trevathan] And that's why
they call it a toga party.

5199488 5203449 [Proximus] You are a funny
little human, Trevathan.
5236554 5239490 You two have come a long way.

5280864 5284502 you are familiar
with the concept of...
5287077 5289673 That is the human label, yeah?

5289808 5294282 The advancement
that I crave requires time.

5294417 5298285 Vast amounts of time
that I do not have.

5299620 5302783 Unfortunately, I am
but a mortal ape.

5305093 5310128 So this is why I need
to get the knowledge inside that vault.

5323546 5329181 humans were capable
of many great things, yes?

5344367 5347894 Apes will learn.
I will learn, yeah,
5348030 5351237 from what is inside that vault.

5373121 5376495 I believe this map
belonged to you.

5379159 5381627 before she was traveling
with you

5395418 5398943 my apes did not realize
their value,
5399079 5403448 so I was brought only bodies.

5403584 5407988 I could not speak to them
like I can speak to you.

5412029 5415462 you are coming here
to get inside my vault.

5425679 5429944 No matter how many apes
it costs me.

5434087 5439085 I have heard that you are
a very clever ape, yeah?

5441390 5445257 He repaired one of your
broken staffs, Trevathan.
5448196 5451971 I have much use for clever apes.

5456504 5460546 did Mae tell you
how to get inside my vault?
5487871 5489443 I have something to show you.
5497077 5499146 Tell me, what do you see?

5531917 5534978 Where there are two
that can speak,

5538752 5544495 Mae has come here to claim
the tools inside my vault.

5552608 5554808 That is why
I must have them first.

5556307 5561741 They do not understand
that this is our time.

5571518 5574990 Unless we want to live
in cages again.

5648869 5653805 And Proximus has no need
for eagles.

5798416 5801316 It would be very good for you
to be there.

5840391 5843060 [Noa] You did not come
for Echoes.

5866087 5868949 - And I was afraid.
- The more you speak,
5871255 5873185 I was wrong not to trust you.

5874491 5877623 I trust you
only to help yourself.
5879998 5882463 But that could help me now.
5896511 5898951 What do you need inside vault?

5910933 5913691 Humans lost their ability
to speak.

5913827 5915562 And this book
might bring it back.
5960213 5962213 And it almost killed all of us.
5969087 5971783 You know a way inside, yes?

5981035 5985269 Will water destroy
what is inside?
6104785 6106258 We're gonna need all of this.
6236058 6237983 We were born within a sunset.

6243025 6244730 [Trevathan] He's just
going to rebuild it.

6265217 6269850 But you're fantasizing about a past
that can never come back.

6290172 6294171 Nobody is going to blame you
for what happened here.

6310464 6312893 He's gonna skin
your monkey alive.

6418970 6421441 [Anaya] You said
there would be climb!
6451767 6453605 We need to go up there.
7025211 7030314 Noa, you are a very useful ape.
7035791 7038417 And yet, you fail to observe

7048037 7051731 Here comes your clan
to bear witness.

7057479 7061675 to put your faith
in such a duplicitous creature.

7079294 7083895 what did Mae have planned
for me inside my own vault?

7158080 7162776 are there more of those
in there?

7542225 7545226 You think you can
destroy my kingdom?

7555270 7558842 You think you can
destroy what I am?

7591439 7594680 so that you can bend
for your king...
7601853 7605891 And you will all bear witness

7606026 7611890 - as Noa bends before his king.
- [all whimpering]
7857505 7861479 Not until you claim all things
7866480 7868953 That silo was a human place

7869089 7870886 with human things
and human ideas.
7871022 7872557 It was not meant for apes.
7877426 7879526 Should we go back to silence?
7905958 7908389 he would tell us his Caesar
7909323 7911798 had much to say on this.
7924913 7930676 Can ape and human live together?

8100084 8100921 [woman] Let me know
what that distribution looks like.

8103458 8105134 - [man 2] Link is ready!
- [woman 1] Pulling up now.
8161175 8163308 This is Fort Wayne, Indiana. We read you!
8164817 8166815 It's good to hear another voice out there.
8166950 8168815 Tell me where you are. What's your location?

subtitles.author: submaster
subtitles.srtFileName: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes - Bonus X-Ray Edition.en-us.forced.srt
lines: 4914958 4917833 Careful, son. We are his now.
